questions.question: Who is Ares' father in Greek mythology?
What is Ares' primary role in Greek mythology?
Which of the following creatures is associated with Ares?
Ares is often depicted riding what kind of vehicle in battle?
Which goddess was Ares' lover and also the goddess of love?
Who was Ares' son, known as a symbol of the violence of war?
Ares was wounded by which of the following gods during a battle in the Iliad?
Which of the following places was Ares' favorite location to engage in battle?
options: D) The fields of Ares' temple

questions.question: In which myth does Ares have a confrontation with his father, Zeus?
options: D) The Battle of the Gods
